FuncDef:
The mld command displays the MLD view.
The undo mld command deletes the MLD view and all the configurations in the MLD view.
By default, no MLD view is not created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Global parameters related to MLD must be configured in the MLD view.
Prerequisites
Before running this command, enable IPv6 multicast routing first.
Precautions
The undo mld will clear all configurations in the MLD view. Exercise caution when running the commands.
